metadata.title: AKS Suspicious Container Command Execution
metadata.description: Detects execution of suspicious commands within containers that may indicate compromise.

properties.description: Detects execution of suspicious commands within containers including reverse shells, crypto miners, and reconnaissance tools.
properties.query:
let SuspiciousCommands = dynamic(["curl", "wget", "nc", "netcat", "ncat", "socat", "python -c", "perl -e", "ruby -e", "bash -i", "sh -i", "/dev/tcp", "mkfifo", "base64 -d", "chmod +x", "chmod 777", "chattr", "xmrig", "minerd", "cpuminer", "stratum", "nmap", "masscan", "nikto", "sqlmap", "metasploit", "msfconsole", "msfvenom"]);
let ReverseShellPatterns = dynamic(["bash -i >& /dev/tcp", "nc -e /bin", "python -c 'import socket", "perl -e 'use Socket", "/bin/sh | nc", "rm /tmp/f;mkfifo"]);
ContainerLog
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| where LogEntry has_any (SuspiciousCommands) or LogEntry has_any (ReverseShellPatterns)
| extend
    ContainerId = ContainerID,
    LogMessage = LogEntry,
    PodName = extract("pod=([^,]+)", 1, tostring(parse_json(LogEntrySource))),
    Namespace = extract("namespace=([^,]+)", 1, tostring(parse_json(LogEntrySource)))
| join kind=leftouter (
    KubePodInventory
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
    | distinct ContainerID, PodName = Name, Namespace, ClusterName, ContainerName
) on $left.ContainerId == $right.ContainerID
| extend
    MatchedCommand = extract(@"(curl|wget|nc|netcat|ncat|socat|python -c|perl -e|ruby -e|bash -i|sh -i|/dev/tcp|mkfifo|base64 -d|chmod \+x|chmod 777|chattr|xmrig|minerd|cpuminer|stratum|nmap|masscan|nikto|sqlmap|metasploit|msfconsole|msfvenom)", 1, LogMessage),
    IsReverseShell = LogMessage has_any (ReverseShellPatterns)
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Namespace,
    PodName,
    ContainerName,
    ContainerId,
    MatchedCommand,
    IsReverseShell,
    LogMessage
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    CommandCount = count(),
    Commands = make_set(MatchedCommand, 10)
    by ClusterName, Namespace, PodName, ContainerName, IsReverseShell

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Suspicious commands detected in container '{{ContainerName}}' in pod '{{PodName}}'. Commands: {{Commands}}
